name: Pummeling Style
text: Your unarmed strikes weave together in an effortless combo, focusing on the spots you’ve weakened with the last hit.
prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike; base attack bonus +6, brawler’s flurry class feature, or flurry of blows class feature.
benefit: Whenever you use a full-attack action or flurry of blows to make multiple attacks against a single opponent with unarmed strikes, total the damage from all hits before applying damage reduction. This ability works only with unarmed strikes, no matter what other abilities you might possess.
staminaText: While using this style, you can spend 5 stamina points to pool all of your attacks as a standard action, instead of a full-round action.
text_zh: 你汇聚全身的力道，打出刚猛的一击。
prerequisites_zh: 精通徒手击打，BAB+6，拳师连打职业能力或疾风连击职业能力。
benefit_zh: 当你用徒手攻击对单个目标进行全回合攻击或疾风连击时，在应用敌方的DR之前先合计自己的伤害。无论你有什么其它的特殊能力，该专长都只对徒手攻击生效。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个流派时，你可以消耗5点耐力来以一个标准动作打出你所有的攻击，而不是一个整轮动作。
